review: I wish I was able to say that I have been able to try out my fire stick but I haven't been able to connect to the wifi. When I called customer service the customer rep suggested unplugging and replugging the stick, which I did. When that didn't work he said I needed to have my tv and stick 2 feet from the router to trouble shoot. (Wait I have to carry my tv down a flight of stairs to fix connectivity issues, when my high speed internet is working fine with my cellphone, kindle and laptop??) I asked if there was any other way to fix this he said that that was the only way to see...So I asked how I could return it if there's no other way and he was quick to give me the instructions rather than solve the issue. I'm disappointed mostly because I was excited for this device because I use Netflix, Amazon prime and Hulu plus. But, I'll just have to switch back to the roku
